Detailed Description

This class represents an identifier reference in a TinyJava expression; may be an array element reference with an index (subscript) expression.

A referred identifier may be either a class field, a method parameter, or a local variable. It may also be a reference to an array alement. A ReferenceExpression is usually a leaf in an Abstract Syntax Tree.

A reference expression representation has:

  • a string representing the referenced name (a variable, parameter, or a class field);
  • an index (subscript) expression, if the reference is to an array element
  • a pointer to the symbol table entry for the name may also be included.
